title: Be My Princess
overview: Ming Wei is a part-time translator who loves acting. Unexpectedly, she was chosen to play the female lead in the upcoming drama of actor Mu Ting Zhou, whose existence is like a god to his fans. In the drama, they act out a love story between a princess and a Great Mentor of the Ming Dynasty. After the accident that caused Mu Ting Zhou to lose his memory, he only remembers Ming Wei, whom he fervently defended as a princess in the drama. To help Mu Ting Zhou recover his memories, Ming Wei begins to take care of his life.An adaptation of the novel of the same name by Xiao Jia Ren.
